about_the_game:
Go with the Flow

An island broken into pieces that are now floating in the sky. In this world, the laws of physics do not apply in the same way as we know it. Endless streams of water pouring down the edges of shards of what you once called your homeland. The only way to push forward is to go with the flow. As Maanu, the water goddess use your skills and the very water around you to your advantage, jumping from island to island. Time your dives and jumps just right in order to make it to the end of this skill-based, immersive water parkour.

Features

  • Surf on the water to build up momentum to navigate the Level
  • Jump multiple times in the air, if you charge up the force of water
  • Dive under the surface to avoid obstacles and hide from danger
  • Dive-Jump to perform an even higher jump, in order to reach islands far away

name: MAANU - Academic Version

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Surf, dive and jump from island to island to make it to the end. This parkour will test your skill. As Maanu, the water goddess use your skills and the very water around you to your advantage, traveling far and wide through this abstract nature.
